[[inst_ld_or]]
==== LD.OR

*Syntax:* ld.or<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Or operation: memory value is atomically ored with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_or.svg[LD.OR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
